#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long int cumulate[100001] = {0};
	int t;
	int n;
	for(int i = 1; i <= 100001; i++) {
		cumulate[i] = cumulate[i-1] + floor(i/2);
	}
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--) {
		scanf("%d",&n);
		printf("%lld\n",cumulate[n]);

	}
	return 0;
}
